channel.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Get ads
channel.description:
Suggested this to an admin a while ago but he has a stick up his ass and is probably giving ranks away or some shit
Anyhow, grow the memberbase by getting ads on other cheating/gold sites. Use sponsored server money as it doesn't appear to be going anywhere as of now.
Why do this? EOC made RS lose many players as well RS3, why not capture them and get them here?

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Get ads
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

I don’t think we want the kind of people that ads bring in, and the kind of people we want have already heard of us.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Get ads
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

RS is dieing and we really need a game that can push us and evolve. Minecraft did that, until it got boring. Ace of Spades was great but not enough people were interested. We need something that we can play for hours on end and gain levels like runescape. Hmmmmmmm

On topic : Don’t waste money on ads

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Get ads
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

thakillah:

because we scared away too many kiddos [size=3pt][sup]noah1gamble[/sup][/size]

Its odd, aren’t you a kid yourself?

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Get ads
item.dc:creator: @Cruel_Truth Cruel Truth
item.description:
@Cruel_Truth wrote:

There is a pro /con situation here really

Pros :
would get actual “new” rsps players
Cons :
make it look like we are making money (really I guess mitb probably is at least a little:p)

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Get ads
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:11, topic:518459”][quote author=Lin link=topic=636725.msg4292881#msg4292881 date=1367641701]
This won’t work. The reason MoparScape is failing is because there are very few smart people actually engaged in private servers to improve the community. Ads will only bring in noobs and there won’t be many people to help. Although, if we had just a handful of people dedicated to help we could recreate the 2006-2007 effect where the noobs got smarter and helped the other noobs.
[/quote]
There are people willing to help others out, the fact is people like yourself got an elitist attitude and most likely feel they are too good to help others out.[/quote]
Not only this, but a handful of people are extremely immature and it seems like those people come here only to troll and what not.

Read full topic

item.title: [RESOLVED - DENIED] Get ads
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Lin:

This won’t work. The reason MoparScape is failing is because there are very few smart people actually engaged in private servers to improve the community. Ads will only bring in noobs and there won’t be many people to help. Although, if we had just a handful of people dedicated to help we could recreate the 2006-2007 effect where the noobs got smarter and helped the other noobs.

There are people willing to help others out, the fact is people like yourself got an elitist attitude and most likely feel they are too good to help others out.

Read full topic
